title: Android Crypto Apps from WhisperSystems: Textsecure and Redphone
description:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA512

# About
These are Redphone and Textsecure, secure communication apps from WhisperSystems.
They were pulled from the official git repos on 26/02/14 and built without modification.

These are here because WhisperSystems has previously objected to a secure, trustworthy
way of accessing their Free/Libre applications other than Google Play, but not all
users have Google Play or are willing to install Google's applications on
their devices.

Included is a pubkey (used to sign this and the below checksums including its own)
that you can use to verify any future torrents I might issue with updated versions of
the app. At least until OWS starts providing an "official" apk.

Please note: These apps enable communication with *hard cryptography* and are well
respected by the information security community. For that reason, you should make
certain that they have not been tampered at upload or download time, and verify
against these sha512 hashes (e.g. using the GNU Coreutils tool 'sha512sum'):

a0597f3681588f4ffc7368b733ec8b3f953730003508bb238060fae0fa09d440ac53fbb2a954873872ca7358d58ce17adbd48c68fd7daf70aacfac2c3e8aac5e  RedPhone-debug-unaligned.apk
23e7c7c863cd21cd4937d389a88c00afc7b6c10928ecf4dc91951c80160f73aa75d1f287398b77086837521022cfbe7c312a1b1f7783ea930689f5bda6424b49  TextSecure-debug-unaligned.apk
a826629995ea63fc0534e5c5f4290de2adafceca1a7ee760564dcaf383dc1a9988b60b5b5b7e7505b6d7dd70c82bb25b1bd197b325eef6bb149829e5dfbc57a7  pubkey.asc

Remember to let WhisperSystems know that you want them to offer their apps through
a more widely available channel than Google Play!

tips: bitcoin:1PExkttxdgcmcyvoMuVD9Lc5nkARXi9344
